txt.en: There is a loud click in the distance as a mechanism disengages
There is a loud click in the distance as a mechanism disengages
There is a loud click in the distance as a mechanism disengages
Within the depths of the barrows, foul creatures are performing a dark ritual of death.
Levers that control the locking mechanism to the gate of the summoning chamber can be found in several large antechambers scattered within the barrow.
In the furthest chamber of the ancient barrow, behind the now-open steel gate, resides the ritual chamber. Enter the chamber and disrupt the dark ritual that is taking place.
Defeat the ritualist performing the ceremony on the fallen corpse.
'Master, they have interrupted the ritual to raise your fallen brother. I shall dispatch them in your name. '
'How dare you disturb my work here!  My brother was felled by the Free Peoples of this world, and I sought to return him to his proper place.'
'Now he lies waiting and in rest. You seem to have undone some of my work here, but my forces shall lay waste to this place.'
Enter the chamber to disrupt the ritual
'Now I shall depart, but I will have vengeance for my fallen brethren.  You shall rue the day that you crossed paths with Gortheron the Doom-caller!'
